doc:
Louis Jourdan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Jourdan 0 Louis Jourdan (born Louis Robert Gendre; 19 June 1921 – 14 February 2015) was a French film and television actor. He was known for his suave roles in several Hollywood films, including Alfred Hitchcock's The Paradine Case (1947), Letter from an Unknown Woman (1948), Gigi (1958), The Best of Everything (1959), The V.I.P.s (1963) and Octopussy (1983). He played Dracula in the 1977 BBC television production Count Dracula. Louis_Jourdan ( born Louis_Robert_Gendre ; 19_June_1921 – 14_February_2015 ) was a_French_film_and_television_actor . He was_known for his_suave_roles in several_Hollywood_films , including Alfred_Hitchcock 's_The_Paradine_Case_(_1947_) , Letter from an_Unknown_Woman_(_1948_) , Gigi_(_1958_) , The_Best of Everything_(_1959_) , The_V.I.P.s_(_1963_) and Octopussy_(_1983_) . He played Dracula in the_1977_BBC_television_production_Count_Dracula .
